# Genaro Pretill — Full Stack Developer

> Personal portfolio of Genaro Pretill, Full Stack Developer specializing in React, Node.js, TypeScript, and cloud architectures. Based in Lima, Perú.

## About

Genaro Pretill is a Full Stack Developer with experience at fintech companies (Izipay/Interbank) in Lima, Perú. Specializes in modern web architectures using React.js, Vue.js, Node.js, TypeScript, and DevOps practices.

## Skills

- **Frontend**: React.js, Vue.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, GSAP animations
- **Backend**: Node.js, Express, REST APIs, GraphQL
- **Cloud & DevOps**: Firebase, GCP, Docker, CI/CD pipelines
- **Databases**: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Firestore

## Work Experience

- Full Stack Developer at Izipay / Interbank (Lima, Perú) — fintech payment solutions
- Projects available at: https://genaropretill.com/projects
